name: Falcon Series( F 16)
description:
This is an arcade game , based on the famous Falcon series( Falcon 1-4) of

a F 16 air combat jet. You will shoot down enemy Migs. This is a 2D


game (vertical scroller). Use arrow keys to control F 16. Left mouse

button to fire (air to air) cannon! AND MAKE SURE TO EXPAND THE 

SIZE OF THE GAME WINDOW BY CLICKING THE EXPAND BUTTON

BOTTOM RIGHT OF THE GAME WINDOW PANE!
